QuestData.Title: Worgen in the Woods
QuestData.Description: Darkness seems drawn inexorably to Duskwood. Master Carevin's quest is the expulsion of evil and heresy. Through our efforts are the people of Darkshire kept safe.$b$bYou believe yourself worthy to join us?$b$bI once thought as you. Disillusioned by the complacency of the Watch, I joined Master Carevin. If you wish to prove yourself, it will not be through words.$b$bTest your skills against the Nightbane worgen in Brightwood Grove. We'll see if you have what it takes to hunt these monsters.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 7 Nightbane Worgen in Brightwood Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: Impressive, $n. It would seem that you are capable enough to handle yourself. Perhaps a more suitable challenge could be found for one of your abilities.
